website_summaries.verdict: Classy living room chair that works well in smaller spaces or as extra seating for guests.
pros: Sleek design is minimalistic and easy to match with existing furniture
Stain and fade-resistant vinyl upholstery is easy to clean
Features tightly woven panel stitching accents
Hardwood frame is sturdy and durable
cons: Low back and compact build may not be the most comfortable for those with larger frames

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good chair for the price. Better than expected quality. It is, however, smaller than one might expect. It works great for me with a limited kitchen area and my 38lb Whippet loves it :) One thing to note...do not throw out the lining that goes on the bottom by mistake. I have included a picture that should give you some idea of size.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs for an office, lounge, den, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a couple of these for guest chairs in my office. They came in good condition without any problems. They went together really easily with the allen wrenches that were included. They are not "leather", but feel like it and are comfortable. I have had them several months now and they look just like they did the day I got them. Great value. Keep an eye on the price though, it seems they were changing the price every day when I was looking at them and I just hopped on and ordered them when the price was "lower". ~$128.00
customer_reviews.author: Nicole and Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Love These !!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable I love these & so does my family & friends when they come over, I would buy them again if anything ever happen to them just because of the feel & for the price you can't go wrong..
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Good looking chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs look great in my waiting room. They are easy to put together once you find that the legs are hidden underneath the seat. They look good and are comfortable and perfect for what I needed them for.
customer_reviews.author: reviewmom

customer_reviews.title: Chair did not look like picture. Material for "leather" came out of box ...
customer_reviews.text: Chair did not look like picture. Material for vinyl "leather" came out of box shiny but had a texture on it that appeared aged 10 years and wrinkled from packaging. Material was neither high quality Vinyl or leather. Color was uneven and warped in several spots and looked like they were bleached in sun. Did not compliment my office lobby; wished I ordered the Hercules Club chairs instead. Will be contacting Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Quality chairs. Perfect for office reception
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are perfect! Much nicer than I expected. Very quality appearance and comfortable to sit in. I ordered them for my office but I'm going to order more for my home because I like them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin A.

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Chairs looks nice.... Unfortunately I would like for my clients to be able to sit in them instead of just look at them. I ordered in Feb 2016. 3 months later.... The leg has broken off!! This is a liability for us as they are being used in our office space. I would love nothing more than for this company to refund our money and come pick up these chairs from our office.
customer_reviews.author: Shipshopper

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Functional
customer_reviews.text: This chair seems to be fine for daily use I bought it for my son to use during online school, it is comfortable and looks stylish, it works well with or without the legs which tuck away in the underside of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Helena C. Lennon

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these chairs for a waiting room. Now I have had them for 3 years but after about a year, the springs started to come up. So when you sit in them, you can feel the springs. For the price I would have expected much better quality. Don't buy them unless you aren't going to sit on them!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: No Legs - Twice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chair for my father and when it arrived, it came without the legs. I sent it back and reordered figuring that must have been a warehouse oversight. Frustrating and a nuisance but I guess mistakes happen... Well, the replacement came - NO LEGS!! Unbelievable! My dad just moved to a facility and has no chair in his room - only a bed. He’s waited weeks for the chair. What a disappointment. Don’t take a chance!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Legs are hidden under the Velcro on bottom
customer_reviews.text: We received the 2 chairs without the legs! After searching the box we realized they are wrapped up and tied under the Velcro covering on the bottom. Great seats. Mice height. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaK

customer_reviews.title: Broken with minimal use.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the chair at first appearance wise, but it was uncomfortable. But it’s broken and the wood was cracked 7 months later. We hardly even sat in it and used pretty much used it for decor. Not to mention we both weigh under 150 pounds. It ended up on the curb, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my office. They are quite comfortable and look more expensive than they are. I am 6' tall and weigh 200 lbs, and I the chair works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Devereaux

customer_reviews.title: I like the chair
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair. I had my sister order me two more since she could get two day shipping however they took a week to arrive. I use them in my business. Clients love them they say they are very comfortable. I like the height some of the legs were a slight challenge to put on. I would definitely buy them again just didn't like the delay in shipping
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Chairs (hidden legs packed at bottom).
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs!! We had to send them back the first time when we received them because no legs were in the package. BEWARE, legs are hidden inside the bottom of the chair (underneath). Otherwise they are cute, comfortable and legs took my partner 20 mins., to screw on and tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon lover!

customer_reviews.title: Nice firm chairs that look good.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a room we redid. They look nice and take only a few minutes to assemble. I was not please with the box it was shipped in, it was mostly ripped because the thickness of the cardboard is so thin and cheap. The chair was not damaged, but 1 inch lower or to the right and it would have been ripped. Better box would make this a 5 start experience.
customer_reviews.author: rzr219

customer_reviews.title: Chair got me in a stupor, yo
customer_reviews.text: I had mixed feelings going into purchasing this chair. What other reviewers seem to gloss over is that this chair has helped my spine alignment​ in ways I would have never expected. However, it may be true that my experience is an anomaly. In any case, this is the most comfortable I've ever felt in any kind of chair for a reason that eludes me.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Walters

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, not even a little bit.
customer_reviews.text: A leg broke within a month of putting it together. Requested new leg, they requested full return of the chair. Attempted to fix leg on our own rather than ship an entire chair back, and since then an entire seam of the back has come apart. This item is not be worth your money, time or effort to deal with the possibility of getting a lemon such as we did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good chair for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good chair for the money. I purchased two and they look good in my mancave. They are light weight, making them easy to move around. Comfort is hit or miss, OK for a short time, not good for long periods of sitting. But in fairness these kinds of chairs in general aren't really designed for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Love the chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs! Purchased for the front lobby area at work. Will pick up a few for home too. $91 a piece was a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Nice little chair!
customer_reviews.text: Chair is even nicer than I expected. Attaching the legs is super easy and if you follow the detailed instructions that are included, it is very clear which leg goes where.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: I like the chair since it really is just for looks ...
customer_reviews.text: There are a couple of small rips in the seams on the back of the cushion and the legs were extremely weird to put on. I like the chair since it really is just for looks in our home office, but disppointed you can see white fabric through the 2 tears where it's attached.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Platt

customer_reviews.title: Great look, great deal!
customer_reviews.text: These were a great deal and look really good; they are also quite comfortable in our office. I could see using them at home as well. They took a little time to assemble but seem sturdy. Exactly the look I was hoping for and less than I've seen this style anywhere else - I am very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: janita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair, great height for relaxing in.
customer_reviews.text: Fancy looking chairs at a great price. A friend of mine bought chairs like these at 3 times the price and says mine look nicer. Great huh?
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Leather Looking Club Chair!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, feels comfortable and for the past three months has held up perfect and still looks brand new! It gets daily use as a home office desk chair and it met all of my expectations. I guess, I just have an eye for great looking furniture. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Y

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable but not for long periods of time. If you are going to have people sit in them for more than 2 hrs this isn't the chair. They are very stylish also
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. It completed my living room. Easy to assemble the 4 legs. Seems very sturdy, and i would say somewhat comfortable. A footstool would help if sitting/reading for long periods of time, but i wanted it more for the looks than anything anyway, so for me it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheap
customer_reviews.text: Hard to build, looks cheap. Spend $20 more abs get a much better one from wayfair.
customer_reviews.author: SPQR

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: This was a complete breeze to put together. It's been a great addition to my living room. Mine didn't have any strange smells as some seem to have had and I've had no issues with the color (mine is black) rubbing off either.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Great price good quality
customer_reviews.text: I must say for the price this is a good quality chair. Took a minute to understand how the legs go on but not difficult. A "smallish" chair but is quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware, Not All Chairs are Alike!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these chairs (had to order one to be delivered to my home, the other to my business) and when I assembled them, the legs on the chairs were different. They are part of a seating arrangement and while the difference isn't a big deal, it is bothersome. maybe that's why they limit one per address.
customer_reviews.author: Holy Smoke Cigar

customer_reviews.title: Took me 30 mins to do 2 chairs and I love them!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! Material is durable, size was accurate and installation was only the four legs. Took me 30 mins to do 2 chairs and I love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nessabb

customer_reviews.title: Chair pretty, leg curved.
customer_reviews.text: One of the front legs is curved. Wood is curved, leg is installed correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Deann  Warner

customer_reviews.title: They look exactly like leather. Feel well built
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these. They look exactly like leather. Feel well built. One wobbles a little, but easily fixed with $1 felt pad. I saw these same chairs at a local furniture place for $100 more each. Glad i found these.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a small office
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair because it was a similar shape to the desk chair in our small home office. It has an odor that will wear off eventually. At first I panicked -- this chair had no legs! Then I discovered the super-secret Velcro hiding panel that held the legs and hardware. It won my heart at that time. The instructions confused me a bit at first, because they are not crystal clear, but I was able to logic out the placement of the legs. It seems sturdy and it has become my new favorite reading chair. Then I ordered "Convenience Concepts Designs-4-Comfort Park Avenue Single Ottoman with Stool" to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Loved the chair! Loved customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the chair. Shipped perfectly and arrived on time. I ordered 3 of these chairs within 2 weeks. The first two were perfect in every way. The third chair some of the hardware was missing for one leg. I contacted the chair manufacturer and they sent me new hardware free of charge. It arrived within a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla in Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Chair!
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable chair, and its amazing how affordable this chair is. Good back support, and I don't regret buying an extra one at all. Buy this chair, and I assure you, it will not disappoint!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Small, but cute!
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, but much smaller than expected. Still cute addition to my living room. I'd reccomend pairing it with an existing sofa or another accent like chair.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Small Chair
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. Can't get comfortable at all. But its a chair and we needed a chair!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this for my office and it is really ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my office and it is really elegant. It is slightly difficult to assemble, but otherwise the chair is really nice
customer_reviews.author: HT

customer_reviews.title: Classy, comfortable, and will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.text: The legs can be a little hard to put on, I had trouble with the last leg but besides that this chair is beyond what I imagined. Great quality and very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Flemington

customer_reviews.title: Great little chair! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I received this club chair very quickly. It is a perfect fit for my renovated small spare room! Bag of hardware was missing 2 washers but not a big issue...Couldn't beat the price for this decent quality. Saw same chair for $200 more.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Maria

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CHAIR... for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving this 4 stars because of the price. If it were more It would be a 3 or a 2 star chair.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Nice little chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. This is the second one I have purchased. My husband and I are small people under 150# so it's cozy for us.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Great chair and price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! Husband put it together in 10 minutes. Purchased it for my daughter. She loves her new chair!
customer_reviews.author: Debra S. Heaton

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: for the price and what we wanted it for it is great but they are definitely cheap quality as I scratched a chair pretty easily - for the price it is what it is and no complaints
customer_reviews.author: jsjj42000

customer_reviews.title: Great quality chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! It is heavy duty and looks great in my living room. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the chair but the instructions for assembling the legs were useless.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with product. Size is just right for a 5'4 180 lbs women and they look great in my Airbnb room!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: but nice and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than expected, but nice and easy to assemble. My dog loves it and it holds up to her nails.
customer_reviews.author: lolo

customer_reviews.title: They look beautiful and stylish but very hard
customer_reviews.text: They look beautiful and stylish but very hard, no comfortable. I am hoping they break in some and soften up
customer_reviews.author: marcie smith

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price...
customer_reviews.text: A little on the small side, but perfect for my room size and intended use for watching TV in a narrow room. Purchased a pair.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are super nice and they are some well made chairs. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, look great. Will see how they hold up. Stylish.
customer_reviews.author: momof3

customer_reviews.title: I like  the chair comfortable  one of the leg brea i need to order a new leg
customer_reviews.text: On of the front leg braek how can I order a new front leg
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: These are great little chairs for the money... I bought two for a sitting area near the fireplace in my rec room, they fit well with the style and are very inviting. Materials and construction are pretty decent and impressive considering it is a piece of furniture that is under $100. Seat cushion itself is a little firm (I can say the same about many comparable chairs that are 10x the cost), but nonetheless the chair feels comfortable to sit in because of the design and how the back and arms wrap around. Chairs come with legs detached, very easy assembly and very stable when finished. All around a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's an amazing chair it's just what I was looking for goes great in my game room
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Habben

customer_reviews.title: If you like firm seating this is great
customer_reviews.text: If you like firm seating this is great! It fills small areas well and is very easy to assemble. I'm very happy with this chair and it looks great in our family room!
customer_reviews.author: ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair for small spaces at a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, sophisticated chair! I really love my chair! I was so happy when my chair arrived and it arrived ahead of schedule which was even better. The shipper was courteous and professional, I was sent an email that my shipment was on the way. It was an easy assembly and my neighbor sat in it for the first time and was so comfortable! I am so glad I ordered this chair. Unfortunately, I wish I had room for another.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: One of them is perfect the other already has some rips in the seam ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these chairs. One of them is perfect the other already has some rips in the seam on the bottom. I hope it doest get worse:( I did get them very quickly though.
customer_reviews.author: Cgardner2

customer_reviews.title: Simon Club Chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair was sent with 4 missing legs. I wish there was no star.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE CHAIRS
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with these chairs. They are will worth the money. They are very will made solid wood and ply wood, no particle board. One of the back legs took a little bit of time to align, but with a flashlight we could where to align it. were easy to put together. They even have a zipper on the bottom cover for easy access to install the legs, and to hide the screws and wood construction under the seat. I am so tempted to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Hagood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty happy with that purchase! Plus the price was really good!
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but lacking functionality!
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to man cave but slippery and hard to keep from sliding of chair. I am tall and slender which may be why but must now sit in it with a leg over side to be comfortable or stay on it. This chair may work for others but will be used as the last seat for guests during games in the cave.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these and they are very comfortable, nice chairs for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly but nice
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are a great buy for the price. I bought three, and one is a little wobbly to the floor, almost like one leg is slightly shorter than the others, and I'm not sure why. But the leather looks real, and they definitely look more expensive than they are.
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: I really love this chair. When I first got it I was very worried that they "forgot" to send me the legs and hardware to put it together. But....they were in a box under the seat of the chair. Once I found them I had it put together in about 5 minutes. It looks wonderful in my Safari room. It is exactly what I had hoped for...and more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Brandner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair and it was easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: kelly johnson

customer_reviews.title: Lindon Chair
customer_reviews.text: While obviously not high end leather it will make any living space look high end and fashionable. It is comfortable enough considering its shape and really, for the price, it's a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: LeoB

customer_reviews.title: The chairs are of a good appearance, but the packaging it was sent in ...
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are of a good appearance, but the packaging it was sent in is flimsy and easy to damage. We ordered 2, and in both packages, the silicon gel package they used to package it with broke open and as I pulled the chair out, hundreds of tiny, TOXIC silicon gel balls rolled onto our floor. Overall easy to assemble and a good, cheap chair to fill out a place (we wanted vinyl for ease to clean and this vinyl looks very nice), but if you can buy better I would do that.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Bridger

customer_reviews.title: Termines!
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair but it came with a huge problem, it came with termites. It has caused me a huge problem.
customer_reviews.author: nenameche

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for additional seating in our home theater room. They fit right in with the black leather theater seating.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Randolph

customer_reviews.title: If you checked out furniture stores and found nothing you like...buy it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my bedroom, it's perfect, easy to put legs on, right color...a lot cheaper that a furniture store, exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Gary Deans

customer_reviews.title: No instructions led to a few pitfalls
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a great chair, but unfortunately it was delivered without any assembly instructions. The legs of the chair come numbered, but the numbering doesn't do any good when you have no idea what the numbers correspond to. As a result, it took a few tries to put this together and it's still a little wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: RoshRosh

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! My clients in the salon I rent love it too....I think I may order another one so I don't have fights when families come in as to who gets to sit in this chair!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Rewitzer

customer_reviews.title: really comfortable. I can't lean back but the support and ...
customer_reviews.text: really comfortable. I can't lean back but the support and height works. Is the cover leather? Feels soft and supple.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Gleim

customer_reviews.title: Linon Simon Club Chair
customer_reviews.text: This product looks absolutly beautiful and elegant.This chair is very comfortable. Good leather quality , very soft. Easy to put together. Great style.
customer_reviews.author: Manon O. Dandurand

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad.
customer_reviews.text: This chair looks fine - about the quality I would expect for the price, but the vinyl really smells bad .Don't know how to fix that.
customer_reviews.author: caneesi

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! I liked the chairs, but there is a warning on the box from the state of CA. that this product contains CANCER causing chemicals. Its not in the the details online, but on the shipment box, can easily be missed. I contacted Amazon and will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: ethelmermaid

product_meta.title: Linon Home Dcor Linon Home Decor Simon Club Chair, 33" x 28.25" x 25.5", Black
product_meta.description: This modern Simon Club Chair features high arms and a deep seat, while the arching backrest and flared armrests provide a retro-modern design that is perfect for any setting. The chair is accentuated by tightly woven stitching and upholstered with stain and fade resistant wipe-clean vinyl. The hardwood frame will provide strength and stability for years to come. The arms and back are generously padded for extra comfort.
feature_bullets: Upholstered with stain and fade resistant wipe-clean vinyl
High arms and a deep seat

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars123 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
